Text: How was it?

I've found the Cult's hideout. But it's a little more
complicated than that.
Quit being all mysterious and spill the beans.
...Is the little doggie impatient?
Grrr...woof!
Easy, Delta. So what are the complications?

A powerful monster seized the cave the Cult was using
as a hideout.

They lost to a monster? I knew they were weaklings,
but that's pathetic, even by their standards!

Or the monster—which happens to be a giant bird—is
way stronger than your average creature.

So what happened to the Cult bastards? Don't tell me
they all got slaughtered.

No, they've encamped nearby the cave and are trying
to regain their hideout.

They could be mistaken for bandits at a glance...but
there's no way a bunch of bandits would be hanging
around such a remote area.

Merchants rarely travel around these parts, so I
guess they've applied the minimum disguise.

Which means this must be a valuable base for the Cult 
and that's likely why they're trying to get it back.
What're we gonna do, Lady Alpha?!

Let's see... Zeta, is there only one way into the
cave?
No, there are two entrances.

In that case, could you lie in wait at one of the
entrances in case the Cult members breach the
monster?
A pincer attack, huh? I like it. Understood.
What about me?!

We'll hunt them down in the way that drives them into 
the cave—that includes the monster occupying the
hideout.

I'll act as your backup. Go ahead and run wild to
your heart's content.
Woohoo! Hunting! Let's go!

I'm gonna hunt them all down! The Cult bastards, the
big bird—everyone! Awooo!

Rein in your howling a little, Delta. This won't work
if you alert them to our presence before we even
get started.

Mnfff...! I-I'm reining it in...! I lurk in the
darkness and hunt down shadows!
...I hope you'll make my work easy for me, doggie.

Hm-hmmm! You can just sit in the corner twiddling
your thumbs, kitty cat!
Look... You know what, never mind...

You two... Could you at least try and get along
during active missions?
No way! Not happening.
Why is this the one time you're perfectly in sync?!

Ack... Did I really miscalculate when pairing them
together? If I can just get the mission to succeed by
splitting them up...!

...Nghh. Unbelievable... Just when we got our
research facility up and running... Now we're
stuck out here in the boonies!

Hey! When are the reinforcements coming to take out
that bird monster? We've been waiting for three days!
Don't ask us... We're just regular guards...

This facility will play a vital role in the future!
What are those idiots at Lindwurm doing?!

I hear there's plenty of chaos and confusion in
Lindwurm as well after the hideout there was
attacked.
All the more reason to send reinforcements here!

This is a critical, cutting-edge research facility! 
It's not just a dumping ground for all compatible
candidates!

...I heard there was fighting amongst the researchers.
I wonder if they exiled this guy here from the Sacred
Land to get rid of him...
Shhh! He can hear you!
Hey! You! If there's something you want to say—
B-B-B-Behind you! Behind!
My behind? Stooping to body shaming now—
Agh...hhh...!

Hunting gets pretty boring when you leave the weakest
for last.
That's why I hunt the weaklings down first!
E-Eeeek...!
Who's the second weakest? You? Or you?
Him!
...Seriously?!
You both look puny, so I'll hunt you down together!
Gyaaaahhh!!!
...The night of carnage begins.
Ha-ruff... Time to get hunting!
Awoooooo!!!
